meanings.definition: A type of Eastern European dumpling filled with ingredients such as potato, cheese, or sauerkraut.
meanings.sent1: My grandma made delicious pyrohy for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of pyrohy with cheese filling.
meanings.sent3: The pyrohy danced in the boiling water before being served.
meanings.sent4: The steam rising from the pyrohy resembled a magical mist.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked pyrohy filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent6: After school, I enjoyed a plate of pyrohy with my friends.
meanings.sent7: The family gathered around the table to enjoy the warm pyrohy together.

meanings.sent1: I will pyrohy with my family this weekend.
meanings.sent3: She decided to pyrohy for her birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: The friends planned to pyrohy at the new restaurant in town.
meanings.sent5: We always pyrohy together during the holidays.
meanings.sent6: Tomorrow, we can pyrohy at the picnic in the park.
meanings.sent7: They will pyrohy at the food festival next month.
